transcript: I wanted to be the best guy on the team and so I would almost let people fail so that I could come in to save the day and show how good I was at whatever it was selling marketing or what not but like that was because I was trying to use the business to solve my own inter personal needs but the business doesn't need to do anything besides make money and to have a business that actually runs without you than it needs to have people who are smarter than you are and that takes humility because they don't need you but the very point of having a business that doesn't need you is that it doesn't need you
